scripts.build:Linux: pkg -o dist/Linux/orderservice --targets node16-linux-x64 . && chmod a+x dist/Linux/*
scripts.build:Darwin: pkg -o dist/Darwin/orderservice-arm64  --targets node16-macos-arm64 . && pkg -o dist/Darwin/orderservice-x64  --targets node16-macos-x64 .  && chmod a+x dist/Darwin/*
scripts.build: pkg -o dist/Darwin/orderservice-arm64  --targets node16-macos-arm64 . && pkg -o dist/Darwin/orderservice-x64  --targets node16-macos-x64 .  && chmod a+x dist/Darwin/* && pkg -o dist/Linux/orderservice --targets node16-linux-x64 . && chmod a+x dist/Linux/*
